website_summaries.verdict: A tried and trusted pet urine and stain eliminator with a wide range of uses. This product is especially well-loved by cat owners who struggle with stubborn urine odors.
pros: Enzymatic formula feeds on organic matter to thoroughly remove both stains and odors
Safe to use on all surfaces and can even be sprayed directly onto cat litter to eliminate lingering odors and save on litter replacements
Free of chlorine and hazardous propellants
Stamped with the Carpet and Rug Institute’s Seal of Approval for user confidence
cons: Heavily soiled surfaces may require multiple applications

website_summaries.verdict: A top seller with a loyal customer base for good reasons – it's highly effective, versatile, safe, and guaranteed to work or your money back.
pros: A versatile formula in a spray bottle that can be used on any stain or surface
Can be used as a laundry stain treatment
Users praise its effectiveness at preventing animals from returning to the same spot
cons: Repeat use may be necessary on serious stains
Mixed reviews on the scent, but most users find it pleasant

website_summaries.verdict: This specialized formula may be your best bet if you're plagued by stubborn odors and stains caused by pets.
pros: Enzyme-activated solution breaks down ammonia crystals and organic matter to fully remove odors and stains, preventing pets from returning to the same spots
Safe for use around children and pets
Approved by the Carpet and Rug Institute for gentle, safe efficacy
cons: Cost may add up if you have extensive problem areas
Needs to be used correctly to be completely effective

customer_reviews.title: Rocco & Roxie wins!! Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Nature's Miracle advanced formula and This Rocco and Roxie formula. Rocco and Roxie formula works every time. It kills, completely eliminates oder. Okay, so not only does it work for cat pee but arm pit oder removal in shirts too! Rocco wins against the other brand, crushed the competition!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Wright

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of $20
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of $20. This stuff does not work, and as a matter of fact, leaves a funky residue on my hardwood floors. My pup still goes back to that same spot again and again. I thought the enzymes were supposed to break down urine so the animal no longer smells it, and won't use that spot?? Anyway, I will stick to vinegar if future accidents happen with my pup. Way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has a strong chemical odor and leaves a sticky ...
customer_reviews.text: This has a strong chemical odor and leaves a sticky residue. The cats still pee in the spots cleaned with this, so I don't think it's effective against cat urine. Update 12/17/17: this is definitely not at all effective, and the chemical smell makes me ill. There's no point in using this when I have to use another cleaner to remove the gunk left by this product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Carpet
customer_reviews.text: This product removed year old urine stains (sigh, rescued Chihuahua) - had tried many other cleaners and this is first that took the old marks totally out. A few stains required two or three treatments but was ultimately successful. It has been a lifesaver! Will definitely buy again as I want to make sure I always have on hand. Update - Originally 5 stars but after a few months my carpet glowed where ever I used product. It took stains out but apparently altered fibers. It wasn’t apparent immediately. I wished I had not used it in so many places.
customer_reviews.author: Ratqueen Reader

customer_reviews.title: Removes stains, initially the scent is a bit strong but it fades as it dries.
customer_reviews.text: A great product that does the job, in my video I do a comparison between a competing odor eliminating spray and used Gearlight UV Flashlight to show the pet urine trapped under the carpet. For stain removal I've used Rocco & Roxie all over my house and it can definitely take on tough stains with minimal effort. My only issue with it was the scent, its really strong and I needed to open a window but once its dried there isn't anything to complain about. The scent is likely a personal preference, so over all it's a great product that I would use again for tough stains.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie and a Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works (even on wood)
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and works well. I have had a long standing pet urine smell in the 1930s wood floors from a prior occupant. After several applications, the smell is gone. The product has a mild pleasing smell that dissipates over time which I really appreciate given my sensitivity to smells. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: you still havent bought it yet? add it to cart!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this already! If you’re like me (skeptical and runs to the one star reviews first) and you are looking for that one review to convince you to buy it or not, this is your sign!! I even double checked with a UV flashlight designed to spot pee stains and I checked again with the UV flashlight, GONE! poof. other sprays arent as strong as this one. The pee stain from my dog smelled so bad and I was getting so annoyed at how it never dried up and how bad the odor was. I can finally let my soul be at peace with the war of pee stains. Happy shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Huang

customer_reviews.title: Wish i had long ago
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly impressed. Really does work. 13 year old dachshund having urination issues and carpet was awful. I think if we had this st the beginning of the issues we would have been better off. Expensive, but works if things arent too far gone.
customer_reviews.author: MRP

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, got rid of urine smell in carpet. To me it has a nice root beer smell.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: plesant odor and quick action
customer_reviews.text: used in a trailer setting. applied three times. odor nearly gone. waiting to see lasting results. very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Asthma suffers beware!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I had to bust out the nebulizer which I haven't had to use in a very long time after I sprayed this in several different spots. If you have asthma or sensitivity to chemicals be very careful with this stuff. And I don't think it worked any better, possibly worse than the other enzyme cleaners I bought before.
customer_reviews.author: Violetdream

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I have an old male cat that has developed the old man attitude and doesn't want to go out in the rain to pee anymore. This products helps to eliminate his nasty attitude. Sometimes you have to spray and clean twice but the Odor Eliminator always takes care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing and Urine is under the perfume
customer_reviews.text: No it didn't work. I bought this product because one of the first questions on the Q&A was will it show under black light. I followed the directions to the letter, well...see the results for yourself NOTHING and I can smell the urine under the strong perfume too. I'm going back to Urine Gone. You can still see the stain under black light but at least the smell is GONE! In order.#1 before application #2 Product applied #3 Dry...still visible and urine smell too!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey18

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am SO disappointed. My cats had peed in the hallway and with all the positive reviews of this product, I was hopeful that both the pee and the smell could be gone. But that didn't happen at all. Used product per directions but area still smells and still lights up with black light. I've almost used the entire bottle with repeated attempts to clean the area.
customer_reviews.author: L. Busz

customer_reviews.title: Cat Cafe Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a week and I love the smell! It's a great spicy aroma. Very unique for this type of product. I manage the Catfe Lounge in Ferndale MI for the Ferndale Cat Shelter. It's kitten season and the babies are just learning to use the litter box. Your product has come in handy! We also have a senior cat named Jessica that was recently diagnosed with kidney failure. Jessica also came from a home where the world was her litter box! I have been using your product to clean up her messes too. I'm sure we will ordering more as this is a constant need!
customer_reviews.author: DeMarie

customer_reviews.title: Odor Free
customer_reviews.text: My elderly dog has recently become incontinent, leaving me with several messes a day to clean up. Using this product on my laminate floors leaves them clean and odor free.
customer_reviews.author: mrcm

customer_reviews.title: Stain and odor eliminator
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product and have used it for the first time. I tried it on an old urine stain and remarkably the stain disappeared. I have also used it on a new spot my dog left me to try so we'll see how that works out. I've always tried to catch the accidents as soon as possible and extract them with a carpet machine, extracting and diluting the area as much as possible. However, you never get it all. The true test will be after I treat a few areas and test them with my blacklight. If the stain disappears or lessens in appearance then I'll know that the product really works.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Boulter

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for Urine Stains on wool rug
customer_reviews.text: Had really high hopes for this after reading many of the reviews. I have a fairly new (less than 2 year) old wool rug in my living room that our bulldog puppy has graced with his urine on more than one occasion. I have shampooed and used just about every product known to man and I still can smell urine :-( I am trying to avoid having to get rid of this rug as it was NOT cheap. :-( I did the treatment for serious stains/odors the other day and let this sit for HOURS and I can still smell urine :-( Bummed....
customer_reviews.author: CCCpa

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy any other kind!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat likes to show his anger about not being let outside by spraying. What a joy cats can be! We have gone through countless bottles of Natures Miracle and it has done a fine enough job. It seems to get the smell out most of the way, but I don’t think it was completely eliminating the cat pheromones because my cat kept spraying/peeing in the same places. After hearing about this we decided to try it and I will only ever buy this! It works much better than the other competitors, yes it’s more expensive but it is 100% worth it because you won’t need to use it as often. Goodbye cat pee!
customer_reviews.author: thecaithudson

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't worth it to me
customer_reviews.text: With three dogs you're bound to have mistakes and it's a good idea to have a product that works cleaning them up. More importantly, that the product doesn't make more of a stain than the one you're trying to get rid of. THIS IS NOT THE PRODUCT - at least not for me. The first time I used it, I blamed myself for using it incorrectly because there was a big round, dark stain left behind. The second time, reading the instructions of use again, it wasn't me. Now I'm left with 31 ounces of a product I can't and won't use or buy again. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: ReadBead&Tea

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous stuff to breathe in!
customer_reviews.text: It's a health hazzard and there should be some sort of warning on the bottle! Not only did it not remove the SLIGHT urine smell, it exxagarated it, and added its own terribly overwhelming odor to the mix, the whole room smells like.. chemical sewage. It's so bad, that open windows and all, I can't enter the room or I vomit. I won't even get into the headache that won't go away. I'm not even asthmatic! Also, whats the sticky residue??? I can't believe I paid for this. Will be returning asap.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaL

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive to not be 100% effective
customer_reviews.text: It smelled great but didn't stop my dog. I sprayed the entire bottle at one point and smelled it once it was dry and it still had a urine odor (And the dog had been no where near it). I told the company this since they "guarentee" satisfaction however they told me I didn't use enough and recommended I buy the whole gallon. For a 4 by 4 inch area of urine I think a 20 dollar spray bottle should do the trick. I'm not paying 50 dollars to find our despite their small percentage off coupon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wear mask when applying
customer_reviews.text: Man, I have run the distance trying to find a spray that actually disintegrates odors and this one is the bees knees. BUT i give you warning, the clove oil or whatever proprietary stuff that's in this will melt your lungs into a spasming cacophony of, well, coughs. Wear a mask when applying. After jt settles there is no thick odor that "masks" stench. The piss is literally gone. Thank god! I even spray it in my cat litter for odor control. Beats the living platypus out of baking soda or whatever perfumy crap they put in litter. Omg, I smell piss right now! Where's my bottle of Rocco?!
customer_reviews.author: hali dutroux

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ ACROSS THE BOARD!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is GREAT! We recently had to live in a rental house because our home was struck by lightning and caught fire. The rental house smelled horrible due to the previous renters smoking in the house and other rancid odors. After a lot of research I stumbled upon this product and decided to give it a whirl because of the many many rave reviews attached to the brand. Well...let me just say that every ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ review attached to sale of this product is true!!! IT WORKS IT WORKS IT REALLY DOES WORK!!! I will never buy another odor eliminating product other than this one again!! I DO highly HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ ACROSS THW BOARD!!!
customer_reviews.author: B Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Works great on rat urine
customer_reviews.text: Restaurant closures amid the on-going pandemic has driven rats into residences, and we found ourselves with a rat problem in our basement. We contacted an exterminator and eliminated the rats, but unfortunately, the odor of rat urine remained. I found the location of the odor and sprayed Rocco & Roxie Odor Eliminator all over and all around the area. I was amazed that this wonderful product completely eliminated the odor -- and that it didn't return. All the positive reviews are spot on.
customer_reviews.author: PNW

customer_reviews.title: Beware. Removes carpet color!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got my second bottle of this stuff, which does have an overpowering smell, but it seemed to be working to remove spots and odor where our rescue puppy had peed. Well, my husband just shampooed the entire carpet, and everywhere I had sprayed this stuff for months (in at least 6 to 8 areas), the color had faded! The color was a medium blue-gray, but the spots where I had used Rocco & Roxie are now grayish pink. I am never going to use this stuff again. I didn't truly pretest the colorfastness of the carpet, but when I applied it and blotted, no gray color came off at all, so I assumed it was color safe.
customer_reviews.author: deborah b

customer_reviews.title: Killed my rotten minnow odor!
customer_reviews.text: I had spilled a bucket of minnows in the back of my SUV. I thought I had cleaned it well, but over the days to follow the "aroma" grew increasingly pungent. I considered this product based on the reviews. Have tried other enzyme based cleaners in the past without wonderful results. Glad I decided to pull the trigger on this one. This product worked amazingly well. There was a strong menthol like cleaner odor which subsided after about 3 days. Even if it persisted long it was MUCH more pleasant than the rotten minnow smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: I have used every single product including home made recipes and nothing works as well as this. The smell is a little annoying. I hate black licorice and that's what it smells like but it dissipates quickly and then there is NO odor. I used it on hardwood floors and vinyl plank flooring. I even used it on fabric. Could not be happier and will definitely be buying again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Rocco & Roxie Stain and Odor Spray
customer_reviews.text: Just used this in a small enclosed toilet area that I think my cat urined in and it works pretty well. Upon initially spraying it, the scent was very strong and smelled of "cinnamon", which smells nice. I didn't wipe it up because I wanted it to really target the urine smell and the next day, the cat urine smell was gone. The after scent also remained and is pretty pleasing. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thai

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything else!
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous about buying this product because of the price tag. Similar products are less than half the price. I'm so glad that I gave it a shot and now I won't buy anything else! This is the only product I have found that completely eliminates a urine smell. You don't need to use much of this in order to get rid of stains and odors. Highly recommend this to all pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment that became overrun with rats through a small opening in the roof. Catching as many as four a day in traps that I used. Finally, after repairing the roof myself, & my catch per day was limited to no more than a single rat once in awhile, the apartment was left with a horrible urine odor. I became desperate after moving alliances & cleaning behind them daily. Then I read an article about this product & purchased a bottle. It worked miracles. The odors were eliminated after the very first use. I can't praise this product highly enough. If your having similar difficulties with overpowering odors, I strongly suggest you give this product a try...
customer_reviews.author: Jim L.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, I'm a believer.
customer_reviews.text: My first reaction was this is an absurd price for a cleaner. But the reviews were so good (and I was a bit desperate). I figured I'd try one bottle. Now I get it. This is the real deal, even if it's pricey. One of our cats was peeing outside the box every single day. The smell, the mess and endless cleaning were really stressing me out. I sprayed down the whole area with R&R, then used it regularly for a couple of days. It took the smell away and she's suddenly stopped peeing there. No pee outside the box since we started using it. I wish I'd gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: JRK

customer_reviews.title: The price made me hesitate but so far it seems to work
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all the good reviews, I decided to give this one a try. I’ve used a few different brands aimed at removing pet stains and smells over the years and they’ve all been okay. I used this spray a couple weeks ago and really like it! I wasn’t removing a stain but needed to remove a smell from a small section of my rug. The spray actually smells nice which isn’t something I thought I’d ever say about a product like this. It’s a strong scent but after a few hours, I didn’t smell it or the original offensive odor any more. I plan on repurchasing when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: WORKS INSANLEY WELL!!!! 5+ ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This stuff is literally AMAZING! I couldn’t even attach a photo because it’s already gone! I adopted a 3yr old pit bull who was used as a breeding factory and left outside or in a kennel her whole life. She has ZERO socialization... no clue what peeing outside or in a specific area was! Needless to say there has been a LOT of peeing in the house and even on my furniture 🤮!! This stuff works sooooo good I can’t even understand how it does this but then again I don’t care how it works, it just DOES!! I am buying the gallon today!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda lynn champagne

customer_reviews.title: WONDER ELIMINATING LIQUID
customer_reviews.text: I searched many hours for product to kill urine/poop smells from my throw rugs that were safe & strong....found & researched this company. I have used it on my rugs, and for the most part I've not had any issues with pet accidents. But the BIGGEST sell, was using in my roommates room by his request, for help on defunking his carpet, couch & bedding. OMG! for atleast 3 days now he's been praising & bragging to his friends of this wonder liguid I found. So if you're looking for something to kill urine/poop smells, this is the stuff. It comes in a spray bottle and gallon jug.
customer_reviews.author: brandy lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Spoke too soon....
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a urine clean up product for the longest time! I was tired of using others that just left a flowery odor mixed with a hint of ammonia. Seemed like it got rid of the smell at first but hours later the odor still lingered. This absolutely cleans up the urine color and odor! So happy I found this and will now be my number one cleaning product! Update: Apparently this product does not work for cat urine. I have repeatedly went over the same spot again and again, gone through most of my newest bottle and the smell is still there. This has also discolored my carpet. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the claims! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: With an aging dog who has renal failure and an indoor cat, this product was a “find”. It not only works to completely remove pet stains from my rugs, but also removes any urine odors so that the spot is not revisited. It eliminates all litter box smells and leaves a clean smell in its place which eventually evaporates into nothingness. I’ve never used anything better and will continue to be a happy customer for a long time. The company sends along directions for removing stains and odors in an email once you purchase and has great customer service. If you think it’s expensive ask yourself what living in an odor free, stain free house is worth to you.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Clements

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I was using the other brand that is highly recommended but wasn’t completely satisfied. It was scented and that was overpowering. It also didn’t remove the odor. But this product, WOW! Highly recommended. A pet climbed up into a sofa and died. We came home and found him. We were going to toss the sofa due to the elimination that accompanies death but decided to give this a try and it worked. No stain and no odor. It’s been 3 months and the odor has not returned. It was hot this summer and it didn’t smell. Our sofa is a light gray and you can’t see any stain.
customer_reviews.author: shopper61

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We purchased for our golden retriever puppy while potty training. This eliminates the smell of urine and my puppy didn’t go potty in the same place again. Little pricey but it seems to work really well. Our puppy (like most) also likes to chew on rugs and carpet. We have also sprayed it on the edges of the rugs and carpet and this seems to deter him from going back to that as well! Granted, we also try and deter him from doing that but this helps. The smell is nice and not over powering. The bottle has lasted a long time (we are over a month and half now). Will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for giving me my sofa back!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes that cute cat made life a living hell. But now I'm able to love on him again. I try everything on the market and was just going to give up and tell myself I'm not going to be able to have a nice sofa but thanks to this product I'm able to remove the order and enjoy my sofa once again. Also if your cat is urinating in your sofa try adding more litter boxes. I added 2 more boxes and it did the trick and he has stop using my sofa as his personal toilet. What remane was the smell and this product took care of that!!
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny!!! We just had to move my mom and her 2 little dogs into our new home due to her health issues. I new her 2 dogs would be urinating on our new carpet in her bedroom. I bought a black light to check and sure enough I found several spots. After researching and reading tons of reviews I purchased this product. So happy I did!! If you follow the instructions it works perfect!! Spots even pass the black light test after cleaning!!! The only thing I regret is not taking pictures to post in this review!!
customer_reviews.author: lora jauregui

customer_reviews.title: I ONLY USE THIS!!....
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on the Rocco and roxie-- INCLUDING THE BAD. I'm glad I tried it because I'm hooked! I literally only have to spray on the "opps" spot and lay some paper towels down. It's totally absorbed and leaves ABSOLUTELY NO STAIN. Best product on the market if you have pets-- A MUST HAVE! This stuff lasts quite a while. Because its industrial and a stain fighter, too, I even tried it as a pretreater on my clothes. I'm buying the gallon size when I finally run out of the 32oz. This is the product to buy for all pets, hands down! Thank you to the inventors of roxie and rocco
customer_reviews.author: Jmyers

customer_reviews.title: MARVELOUS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just amazing! I used it on a spot just designated for my cats litter boxes. ( the corner wall ) I was to the point in tears, the ammonia. I did a quick spray of the whole area and the odor was cut by half. That in it self I was extremely happy. I didn’t do a deep clean just a quick one. But now I can’t wait to do a deep clean. The fragrant of the cleaner was not overwhelming or sickening. Highly recommend. (Will update after deep clean and a pair up with angry orange) I will be buying more and 1 for the 2nd cat lady in the family lol
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: This REALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic but oh my gosh. This is AMAZING! Our potty trained dogs had an accident and then started marking. Agh! And then despite shampooing the carpet 8x with our rainbow there was still a lingering smell. Y’all I tried everything. Baking soda, all the drug store shampoo cleaners and nothing worked. So thankful when out of desperation went looking for another product and found this one. It’s worth every penny. We also bought the blacklight flashlight which helped us find the old spots we just couldn’t find (and getting on my hands and knees wasn’t working) *warning don’t use the light anywhere else...an OCD cleaners works nightmare. These were old set in spots and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Saved Me From a Bath Remodel
customer_reviews.text: So we bought a house. Apparently, the previous owners had used the master bath toilet room as a place for their pets to use the restroom. The smell was repulsive. We used all sorts of cleaners to get rid of the smell. We even used bleach. All to no avail. My wife was determined we'd have to tear out all the sheetrock AND tile and redo the restroom. Instead, I decided to give this a try. Worked like a charm. It helped to reduce and eliminate the odor. Helped save me thousands on a bathroom remodel. I'm sure it can help you too.
customer_reviews.author: David Osteen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Just after placing my order, I received an email on how to use the product that was much more detailed than the bottle. That’s was great, when it came, I followed the directions to the letter, and the stains were only slightly lighter, but eventually came darker again. I kept repeating the process thinking that they were really deep, but , unfortunately, it looks exactly the same after four times. I’m very disappointed, because based on other reviews, this should have taken out the stains.
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING product!
customer_reviews.text: My previous cat had peed on my beautiful, expensive shag rug and I had it professionally cleaned, but new kitty must have still detected the scent because she then peed on it in several spots as well. The odor was overpowering. I bought this product to try and clean the rug myself, but didn't have much faith it would work. Quite the contrary! It was easy to use and worked amazingly well. I saturated the spots on both sides of the rug and let dry overnight. Then I just vacuumed the rug and the urine smell was gone. All that remained was the pleasant scent of the product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Best product in the World for odor elimination
customer_reviews.text: There is not much to say other than this is an excellent product to eliminate undesirable smells,specially urine,our kitty had an "accidental pee"its our fault because we kept him away from his litterbox too long,while in my wife's lap on the way back from a Veterinarian,unfortunately we happened to be inside our 2019 Acura Suv with perforated leather thru which urine leaked into,after 4 separate treatments that involved several off the shelf odor eliminators and even a fabric steam cleaning machine the smell still persisted ,after using Rocco & Roxie spray cleaner the smell dissappeared,we are totally blown away,I will only continue this product for similar problems,five stars definitely!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm on cat piss!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new suitcase and for some reason known only to cats our tomcat decided it was a "great place for me to pee on" (apologies to Triumph). Tried several other things and still had odor - but not with this stuff! Then about two weeks later he accidentally got shut up in the master bedroom all day and proceeded to relieve himself in the middle of our bed - so I was glad I had this. Soaked up the wet stuff, sprayed good with this, and washed as per normal and it did the trick. If you have animals that occasionally have accidents, you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Albert

customer_reviews.title: I am SHOCKED!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked! I have a rescue dog who has trouble going to the bathroom sometimes and had gone to the bathroom all over our brand new couch. I had tried everything I could think of to get the smell out of our cushions and nothing was working. With one use of the spray, the pee smell is GONE! I am seriously so elated! We have also been using it on our carpet where there have been accidents and from what I can tell (after one use) it is doing great! I will be keeping this product on hand from here forward! I love that it’s safe for kids and pets to be around as well. THANK YOU! Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: dont expect this to completely eliminate your pet stains
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned about 80% of the effected carpet area. The company guarantees that the product is 100% effective so when they sent me an email checking on my satisfaction, I mentioned that the product had not completely removed the stain. They said they would be happy to send me another bottle to treat the area again and they were sure that that would do the trick. They never sent it! Talk about poor management of customer expectations! Dont expect this to work 100% because it will not!
customer_reviews.author: Roger F

customer_reviews.title: Eh..
customer_reviews.text: Well look, I read the reviews and tried other ways to get rid of this pet stink from rug and decided to give this a shot. It didn't eliminate the smell as much as it covered it up... and it covered it up with a... scent. It almost smells like black licorice. It didn't bother me at first, but it really lingers after a while. After cleaning the rug with another detergent to try to eliminate the black licorice smell, it got fainter but hung around our basement for another week. If you like black licorice, then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Really makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I've been having some issues with my closet smelling like cat urine. I have cleaned my carpets multiple times with so many different pet odor eliminating products and nothing has worked. I found this with pretty decent reviews and decided to give it a try. I'm really glad I did because this product is the only thing that has made a difference. There is still a faint smell but it is so much less than it was. I think I just really need to soak the spot. Really happy I was able to find something that makes a huge difference and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had a old urine scent on a box spring and flooring in a guest room. I Used another product that was suppose to remove all traces of the urine. It didn’t. So my little long haired Chihuahua boy peed on the area again. I read the reviews of this product and thought I would try it. I fallowed the directions carefully. I think it worked. My little guy came into the room and didn’t even go over to smell the area. I think the scent is gone. Time will tell. Remarkable product. I used it on flooring without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: cathy k

customer_reviews.title: Flat out works
customer_reviews.text: Bottle can get smell 90% out Ditch the sprayer and soak/drench to get it 100% Consider getting more than spray bottle for any serious job. DOES WORK! Doesn’t have the harsh chemical feel to it, however when using liberally, does have a smell itself. But smell does fade unlike some products. Won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: love, love, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My Bichon is a sneaky little something and when he's met with my assertiveness he likes to get me back by marking the sofa, I'm currently in the habit of breaking him out of his pure pettiness but in the meantime this spray is no joke, i spray, let sit, and dab out. No discoloration or weird after smell, no difference in the feel of the fabric (which is a brush cotton), it truly works. I've also began using it to clean my toilet, it's not abrasive at all, it wipes out that lingering smell that I absolutely hate, and unlike some cleaners, it doesn't give my bathroom that 'public restroom' smell. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: This s$&t really works like magic
customer_reviews.text: Ok first I don’t waste my time ever giving reviews but I had to with this one. I had a huge stain from turmeric on my carpet I mean huge I tried everything you can imagine nothing worked it’s a very expensive carpet and made me sick just thinking about having to replace it. So I said let me check amazon to see reviews on the best remover. I got this one home sprayed it on my carpet and like magic the stain totally gone just like they said it was magic. I can’t stop smiling thank you so much for your product and finally getting something where it was just as Described. You really came through on this one.
customer_reviews.author: lisa king

customer_reviews.title: This product is worthless
customer_reviews.text: This product was the most expensive I have used for eliminating cat pee odor. It ws guaranteed and had great reviews. I am contacting the mfg. IT DOES NOT help. Although a large part of the odor is masked, it does NOT eliminate the odor and my cat smells it so goes back to his spot. I have tried this continually, to no avail. Not worth the money and the scent is AWFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: My new "Go to" for carpet cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works and . I followed the instructions, used generously, and weighted it down overnight, next morning hooray! I wasn't sure if I could feel a bit if residue so I took a clean cloth wet with very hot water and rubbed it over and it feels like new. Saves a lot of time and hassle with a machine. Has a nice smell. I used a so-called generous amount but it really doesn't take much to be "generous" so I'd call this fairly economical too.
customer_reviews.author: fiveminutesmoreo

customer_reviews.title: It works the way it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: It is no easy task removing pet urine odors from an upholstered chair. My dog is very elderly and has typical elderly male problems. I found this product after trying half a dozen others. The science behind it was explained (I love a scientific reason something works or fails to work) and I followed the directions exactly. I did have to do a second round on one trouble spot, but my dog has not returned to the scene of the crime since I treated the area. I'm buying another bottle to have an hand.
customer_reviews.author: AP1980

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to clean up messes!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I've been using the store bought nasty smelling Resolve pet stain remover for the past 8 years. As soon as I took off the plastic off of this cleaner I got a whiff of this mind blowingly magnificent smell. I can't get over how awesome this stuff smells I'm actually excited for my dog to make a mess so I have a reason to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful and lingers.... Didn’t want to continue using it after I bought it bc the smell itself was bad. Tried using it to cover/ clean urine smell when my mastiff had bladder stones ( that’s a lot of urine!) and the smell it left behind wasn’t worth spraying again. Almost smells like a wet dog
customer_reviews.author: K3

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well  - strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product at first however, anything with a money back guarantee is worth trying right? This one was for sure. My newer rescue dog has anxiety and keeps peeing on my rubber. If you follow instructions, spray it, let sit and them wipe it sids nicely removed the stain and odor and works great. First and only product to remove stain and odor. I will say the odor of the product is a bit strong for me but I am more sensitive but it does it’s job and then the scent is gone and my runner is clean and spot free front and backside. Highly recommend this product for pet messes.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgy's Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got a new puppy. Needless to say there have been a few piddle puddles. This stuff works great. I soak up the wet and then spray with the Eliminator. Voila, works great. It has a slight smell when you first spray it, but it doesn't last long. The pup is not going in the same places at all, its all pretty random at this point. After 4 days, she knows going outside its where to go, but sometimes she gets the order wrong....she pees, then goes to the door. Well, she is only 8 weeks old.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I am not entirely in love with the scent this emits upon spraying- HOWEVER, the alternative to this [temporary] licorice smell was a musty, pheromoney god-awful odor that sent everyone running for the hills. It does what it claims to do. Once you spray the area, you let it set and the enzymes eat away at the stank. A few hours later, once you return to inspect the area- voila!! It’s renewed and refreshed. I’m amazed by that because historically- cat urine odor was all but impossible to remove. This is some good shiznit.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is just amazing. Hands down worth the investment and superior to anything you're going to find in the grocery store. It kills odor and years of caked on cat pee (just flakes right off). It has also discouraged the dog from remarking when he has an accident. It has a faint minty smell that isn't overwhelming. I have tried all manner of lower priced enzyme cleaners that don't even touch this stuff. Its pricey but if you're working on restoring a home that has years worth of hidden cat toilets then this is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Its good on uric acid. If you have areas like in a carpet where there are dark stains and you have a dog those are probaly uric acid stains. Spray some of this on the carpet and wait a week or so. You will see that it makes the stain go away and when you clean it with the rug cleaner it will remove it completly. The odor remover really works well.I have a small dog and alot of times he would like to mark things. This spray helps alot in that. Cant beat it.. for the price and its one of the few products that does what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph  Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: No more cat mess
customer_reviews.text: My niece needed a place to live for one month before college started. She and her cat moved in. Her cat began marking territory. My cat fought back by marking, pooping and peeing every where except her cat box. Once they moved out I ordered Rocco & Roxie. I spent one night crawling the house with a black light to identify all the spots. I went through an entire bottle of Rocco & Roxie. The smell was pretty strong when I was spraying it. I would recommend a face mask. No bad smell after it dried and no cat mess anywhere since. I'm ordering another bottle in case we have any future issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Boeger

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that I have found to work on set in dog urine stains/odors. Our red heeler has a mass in his bladder which makes him feel like he has to go urgently and he doesn't always make it outside. I have professionally cleaned the carpet and tried numerous other products to no avail. Rocco & Roxie worked beautifully the first time I used it. I did have to use a lot of product because the sub-floor had been penetrated, but it was completely worth the price. Other reviewers have complained about the smell, which is unique but not bad- it reminds me of Noxema face wash. Product and service are both 5 stars and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa P

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome to eliminate odor
customer_reviews.text: I have a child with special needs so often have pull up leaks that get on the carpet and furniture. As everyone knows, urine is difficult to clean up from fabric using a shampoo/ detergent alone and I’ve tried many different products to eliminate the lingering odor that seems to always return. I’m pleased to say that this is the only product I’ve found so far, other than bleach which you obviously can’t use on carpets and furniture, that removes the odor. I’ve already purchased 3 bottles on recommend it to all my other mom friends.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Postle

customer_reviews.title: Reviews may be hyped up
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty disappointed in this product. With all the raving reviews I would have thought it would have been better but we were let down. As far as stain removing goes I’m not totally sure since my carpets are pretty dark but this stuff barely touched the smell. Mess was cleaned instantly with this product and later in my carpet shampooer and odor is still there. I’ll admit the odor is less but I was expecting more from the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised!
customer_reviews.text: My boxer was taking medication that caused her to have accidents in the house. Hardwood floors are VERY unforgiving when it comes to urine. I panicked when returning from work to find the front foyer flooded! After trying various other treatments I ordered this stain and odor eliminator and really didn't expect much. Guess what? It really does work! There was a drastic difference in the smell after only one application. After repeating several times over a period of days the smell was completely gone! Great product! Definitely recommend to anyone with pets!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: It works 100%
customer_reviews.text: This totally works! I recommend it without hesitation. My cat peed on my couch, all the way soaked through the cushions. I sprayed it with this product and the smell is gone! I tried some other, grocery store-bought spray first, but it only masked the odor, and in a way made it worse because it added an orangey-chemical smell on top of the urine smell. Also, this product is color safe. My couch has a dark brown fabric and it didn't leave any stains or discoloration. I now use it everywhere, on carpets, floors, and upholstery, whenever my cats deliver a hairball or vomit. Luckily, I haven't had a problem anymore with cats peeing on furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Oesterle

customer_reviews.title: Works, even on persistant cat urine!
customer_reviews.text: This company is fantastic, and so is their product! Buy it! I had cat urine on a rug, and the oder was VERY persistent. At that time I received an email from the company asking if I was satisfied. I expressed concern that smell was not coming out, after multiple applications. They expressed confidence it WOULD come out. I followed their instruction to let it completly dry. I did, and this product did completely remove the smell. I highly recommend this product, and it will be my go to in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mark’s Music

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats decided to stop using the litter box and start peeing on my 1950s wood floor. The floor long ago lost its glossy sheen, and the urine soaked in quite nicely. The smell was horrid. I tried nature’s miracle but to no avail. I had had this on my wish list for forever but had not purchased it due to the price. I finally decided to go ahead and buy it because I had a reason to and it was my last hope. Thankfully, it worked! This stuff literally eats the nasty stuff. Truly, a miracle. I cannot recommend this highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: BreannaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We are currently fostering a litter of 6 puppies in our home office (carpet). After a few days and quickly realizing that the puppy pee pads aren't working and the carpet being stained with every single puppy bodily fluid, I was desperate for some sort of cleaning spray before I can get a professional cleaning company to come and get everything out. This spray is fantastic! The odor is eliminated! This spray is great! We are still getting our carpet cleaned but this will save it for the next few weeks we still have the puppies in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this spray for a long time. If you use it correctly (let it sit on the soiled area for 5 min) your dog or cat will not return to that exact area and soil on it it. Will it return and go 6” away from it? Possibly. But this stuff works great on carpet. I will admit I bought the Nature’s Miracle spray for Hardwooe floors because it was specifically formulated for hard floors. I have use Rocco and Roxie on my hardwood and tile floors and I notice (especially on tile) that it leaves a light shiny residue. Just sayin’
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Great stain remover and pee detractor for pets
customer_reviews.text: I have a little dog who is a total jerk ( as much as I love him) and after 8 years, still insists on marking things in his own house. I hate it. Rocco & Roxie has not only removed stains and smells from furniture and carpets he has decided to claim as his own, but it prevents him marking those same areas again! I'm not a huge fan of the smell, but it's TOTALLY worth the reward. Highly advise trying it if you're undecided.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I tried just about everything to get rid of the horrid cat pee smell when I moved into my new house. The previous owners cat had peed in the same spot on the carpet and it had soaked into the plywood floor. I removed the carpet and soaked the floor with other products, but nothing really worked. I used this and it took out the smell perfectly. 4 months later and its still gone. Don't bother with anything else - this is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Benken

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Followed instructions sent by the manufacturer and have this far cleaned up pee and poop stains from our new puppy in training....even an old dried pee stain we found a few days after the deed was done. Cleaned it up beautifully. Smells a bit like vicks vapo rub but that smell quickly dissipates and eliminates the pet odors very well. Works better than Nature's Miracle which we had been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smells like anise, strong but natural
customer_reviews.text: This is good, effective stuff, for spraying laundry (pre-treating the fabric and keeping the laundry room from smelling bad) or bathroom floors and preventing them from smelling like urine, if you are cleaning up after someone who is facing challenges, if you know what I mean. The sprayer makes using it easy. It does a good job neutralizing stains and odors. It smells strong, but not terrible. I can't abide chemical odors, some powerful cleaners really cause me respiratory distress, and this doesn't. It comes across as strongly herbal, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We had water backup in our carpeted basement and didn't know it. When we went down there after the water sat for about a week the carpet wreaked of mold. We scrubbed the carpet by hand and then with a heavy duty steam cleaner. Then I poured this odor eliminator on the spot (@ 6' x 6') and let it set for a day. Next day we went down and steam cleaned it again, used the dehumidifier and BINGO no more odor. I would recommend this product very highly!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L. Hannahs

customer_reviews.title: Second bottle --works like a champ! Doesn’t smell like flowers either...
customer_reviews.text: We black light regularly to check dog issues....this stuff works best on fresh but actually works really well on “hidden” spots we don’t see until we black light. We used it for our older dog for occasionally stomach upset issues that hit the carpet but with the addition of a new terrier pup we needed more. It always takes a while to fully train a terrier to trustworthy level---she can quickly sneak off to a hidden spot without us ever knowing. Like the spice clove type scent of this stuff. Strong when wet but quickly disappears as it dries. No overwhelming “I am a mix of flowers” scent that gags
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product several times now for puppy urine mistakes on carpet. Also used it for another dogs vomit with green leaf material in it and his diarrhera from eating something bad from the yard. I have only had to use a 2nd application for the green vomit. The product does work. It has a very strong oder to it which dissaptes within an hour as the product attacks the stain. I am pleased with this product as my carpeting is only 2 years mold and needs to not retain any smells. I believe I will place a 2nd order for this product shortly!
customer_reviews.author: Schnauzer Lady

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I just can’t say enough about how effective this spray is. We used it in our attic crawl space after clearing out old insulation revealed the mother load of rat poop and the scent of critter urine that curled my whiskers. After removal of the detritus, the spray was applied. A few hours later, only the scent of wood framing remained. This spray delivered! Get that ammonia scent outta yer life!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this in between washing the grass pad that I leave out for my dog. I don’t want the whole bedroom to smell like urine. It works alright- but it doesn’t seem to be as effective at “eating away” the urine as I thought it would. Too pricey for me to buy as much as I would need for the month. Has a good scent and I would trust it to help remove pee stains on carpet, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda7365

customer_reviews.title: Warning this product has an INTENSE wintergreen smell!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I used the product as directed, but the smell of dog still remains in my car's upholstery, even after using Skunk etc first. Granted my case was probably pretty extreme, lots of doggo funk, poop, pee and vomit that has been on the fabric and foam seats for years. My biggest gripe about the product is the INTENSE wintergreen smell the product has. It made being in my vehicle unbearable for almost a month before it finally dissipated. They should let customers know this is the case. I would have never spent this much money on this product had I known.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ned of the Raging Queen

customer_reviews.title: Takes care of stubborn smells!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats. And carpet. Normally these cats are really good but we had some construction done and they were locked in a bedroom. With all the craziness I didn’t realize there was pee on the carpet until it was too late and I couldn’t find the exact spot. I could smell it in the room, and it was bad. I tried vinegar and baking soda. I tried the orange stuff. Two weeks later, the pee smell was back. It was awful. I bought a UV flashlight and this stuff. *YES*! I’ve been retreating the spots every week for about 3 weeks and the smell is nearly gone. THIS STUFF 100% WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell, but works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic for cat urine stains and smells on both carpet and throw pillows. My cat also stopped re-marking in the same place and went back to using her litter box like normal. However, I am very sensitive to strong smells, and while the smell isn't unpleasant, if you have a large area to clean and must let it sit for an hour, it can be overwhelming. I was sneezing and had to open a window and run my air purifier. So beware of this if you have allergies. Great product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Sera

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to eliminate cat urine odor on our bathroom carpet. Immediately after spraying the carpet, the odor was eliminated and remained that way after the product dried too. Used the spray on an old cat urine spot and the smell at that location was immediately eliminated and again, after drying, the urine odor did not return. If it continues in this manner for at least another month, we will be dedicated users of this product on behalf of our beloved 18 year old family pet who has had the occasional accident over the last six months.
customer_reviews.author: ljgm6

customer_reviews.title: Good smelling stain remover
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very nice smell (light, minty, and fresh). It also does seem to eliminate urine odors and stains. It's easy to use. I already bought my second bottle. My only complaint is that it gets used up quickly...I've had to use a lot of this product for just one stain/spot, because I needed it to soak deep into the carpet (as per the product instructions). Because of this, I really wish this came in bulk size and/or a concentrated formula. I also really wish this came in a formula to use with a carpet cleaner...I'd like to use it on my entire carpets!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Stinks 4 Lyfe
customer_reviews.text: This made my entire house smell so bad!!! All I did was spray a little on tile around the litter box and my entire family turned against me. It’s winter and we have the windows open, and I’ve been mopping over the area with vinegar hoping to regain my family’s trust. Our house STINKS, our throats BURN, this was not what I expected. I guess I thought this would be like a super version of Nature’s Miracle and it is not. I much prefer the smell of cat urine to this.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product as much as so many other reviewers did! But sadly, it didn’t quite work for me as it did with other homes. I have light gray carpeting throughout my house, and as the instruction suggests: to patch test a small area first for any possible staining - this formula did stain my gray carpet to a brownish color. I’m sure the product works great, but it just didn’t work out for me. Also, I really disliked the scent of this product. It does not have a fresh or pleasant smell. I had to re-clean the area I used the product on with another carpet cleaner to get the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My. Gosh. This stuff is amazing. I’m on my 3rd bottle due to a young puppy who is just learning to potty train. The spray works like a charm! I can’t even tell where her accidents have been around the house after treating them with the spray. We’ve used Rocco & Roxie on wool, cotton and jute carpets. It left no stains, smells or marks! The scent is great. Since we use it a few times a day, I thought the scent would get annoying & take over the house, but nope—house smells normal. It also worked for some grape juice stains that were on my carpeted steps. I sprayed a small amount & boom—gone. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable Product with Pleasant Scent ... I Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I postponed my review until I had used this product on several surfaces several times. This is without question a remarkable product that removes pet stains and odors on first attempt with a pleasant scent and without caustic odors and, for me a skin reaction. I have an elderly dog that is becoming forgetful and is suffering a stomach problem as well. This product has been a much needed answer to solving his accidents. I Wil purchase more and recommend it to friends with pets. My only concern is the price but when compared to its ease of use and pleasant scent it is worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a spot in my couch that my dog had absolutely soaked in pee. Problem was, she was smart enough to kick a blanket over it to hide her handiwork! My old gal is lucky she’s so cute. I discovered it the next day and safe to say, it absolutely REEKED. I cleaned it with the pet cleaner I had, which still left me with a urine odor. Found this on Amazon and ordered it due to the reviews. I was NOT disappointed. This stuff absolutely WORKS. There’s zero smell, zero stain. My girl will be 11 years old soon and is still full of energy (also, full bladder apparently). I should just buy stock in it now!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT GET THE JOB DONE!
customer_reviews.text: I was very optimistic about this product after reading so many wonderful reviews. I did not have anywhere close to the same results as fellow consumers. The scent from this product was so strong that it made it hard to breath when using it I’m close quarters. I was fine with that If it eliminated the urine odor, it did not. It definitely decreased the smell by making it but the odor still lingered for sure. I followed directions and reapplied several times with no success. So basically my carpet still stinks and I’m out $20 after finishing the entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: DOOM

customer_reviews.title: pleasant
customer_reviews.text: I bought a car that had no noticeable smells. After several days baking in the hot sun, a smell somehow appeared. I believed it to be a urine smell from the previous owners animal. the smell was particularly offensive after leaving the car in the hot sun to cook with the windows up. I applied this product and used a drill brush attachment to work it down into the fabric and cushion. It has been a week of sitting in the hot sun and i have not smelled the original putrid smell since the application. The scent of this product is pleasant and not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Spitfish

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner for pets on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaner on the market and I have used them all ! My poor baby has Megaesophagus and when he goes through a bout of regurgitation he can’t help where he throws up . This is the only cleaner that truly gets out the stain so it’s like it was never there . I love the smell it’s not overpowering and doesn’t smell like normal cleaners that use harsh chemicals. My only wish was that it was less expensive as I go through it quicker than I wish I did . However , Nothing works as amazing, so .. I will continue to buy forever .
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated ammonia smell!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had cats for my entire life and unfortunately every now and again you get one that feels the urge to pee in the house. The smell is unmistakeable and completely overwhelming. This product is the only thing I’ve ever used that completely eliminates the smell. You have to use a decent amount of it, but if you follow the steps it says to do it works like magic. I’m not sure how it will work as a deterrent to them not peeing again, but it definitely worked to get the ammonia smell completely gone in one use. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Stanovich

product_meta.title: Rocco & Roxie Supply Professional Strength Stain and Odor Eliminator, Enzyme-Powered Pet Odor and Stain Remover for Dogs and Cat Urine, Spot Carpet Cleaner for Small Animal.
feature_bullets: ELIMINATES STAINS, ODORS AND RESIDUE If it’s gross, it’s gone. Not just the stain, but the stink. From stinky yellow pet urine and feces to vomit and other organic spills, our professional strength formula tackles them all.

ENZYME ACTIVATED The key is getting to the problem deep-down. This spray contains natural enzymatic bacteria that are activated on contact with odors and stains, feeding on ammonia crystals and organic matter until they are completely eliminated.

CERTIFIED GENTLE AND SAFE Chlorine free and color safe. Safe to use around pets and children. No hazardous propellants, no residue left behind. So gentle it’s been Certified Safe for all carpets, earning the Seal of Approval by the trusted Carpet and Rug Institute (CRI)
EVERY SURFACE, EVERY TIME For use on carpets, floors, furniture, clothing, litter boxes, kennels, carriers, all pet living and sleeping areas -- anywhere stains happen.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED An Amazon best seller for a reason. If your stains and odors aren’t gone, neither is your money. We’ll refund it in full
